name: mris_info
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Prints out information about a surface file.

inputs.name: Surface file
inputs.description: Surface file to process

inputs.name: Outfile
inputs.description: Save some data to outfile

inputs.name: Subject hemi surfname
inputs.description: Instead of surfacefile

inputs.name: Talairach XFM flag
inputs.description: Apply talairach xfm before reporting info

inputs.name: Rescale flag
inputs.description: Rescale group surface to match average metrics

inputs.name: Patch file
inputs.description: Load patch before reporting

inputs.name: Vertex number
inputs.description: Print out vertex information for vertex vnum

inputs.name: Extended vertex number
inputs.description: Print out extended vertex information for vertex vnum

inputs.name: Curvature file
inputs.description: Check if curvature file vertices match surface vertices

inputs.name: Annotation file
inputs.description: Check if annotation file vertices match surface vertices; dump colortable

inputs.name: Area stats flag
inputs.description: Compute stats on triangle area (n, mean, std, min, max)

inputs.name: Edge metric ID
inputs.description: Compute stats on edge metric (n, mean, std, min, max); id=0=length, id=1=dot, id=2=angle, id<0= all

inputs.name: Edge number
inputs.description: Print out extended information about edge

inputs.name: Vertex number for Matlab
inputs.description: Write Matlab file to plot vertex neighborhood

inputs.name: Matrix format
inputs.description: Set format for matrix printing (e.g., %12.8f)

inputs.name: Quality stats flag
inputs.description: Print out surface quality stats

inputs.name: Intersections flag
inputs.description: Print the number of vertices that belong to a face that intersects another face

inputs.name: Mask file
inputs.description: Only compute edge and area stats using vertices in mask

inputs.name: Label file
inputs.description: Only compute edge and area stats using vertices in label

inputs.name: Edge file
inputs.description: Print edge info for all edges into file

inputs.name: No GIFTI display flag
inputs.description: No dump of GIFTI struct, read .gii as surface instead

inputs.name: Version flag
inputs.description: Print version and exits

inputs.name: Help flag
inputs.description: No clue what this does
